brilliantgreen333 wrote:

> Could someone please give a quick overview of the purpose of this
> class?  Specifically the testWrongException method?

It is generally agreed that ExceptionTestCase is not worth the effort to 
use it, so you might not find anyone who knows how to use it at all. See 
http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?JavaUnitBestPractices and look at the section on 
exception testing.
